actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of noncorporate taxpayers gain the sale or exchange of assets which have been held by the taxpayer for more than 1 year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of noncorporate taxpayers gain from the sale or exchange of capital assets held by such taxpayers for more than one year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of noncorporate taxpayers gain the sale or exchange of assets which have been held by the taxpayer for more than 1 year.
